long_description: Bring hydration along without a bulky pack or vest with the Mysterioso Hydration Shirt for women. It offers water-friendly fabric, a built-in hydration bladder and a design suited for paddlers. Rear pocket holds a 1L hydration bladder; compression-fit top uses tension bands sewn into the fabric to support the weight of the bladder. Moisture-wicking, quick-drying, sun-protective fabric along with the highly engineered body silhouette are designed to work in and out of the water.
short_description: Bring hydration along without a bulky pack or vest with the Mysterioso Hydration Shirt for women. It offers water-friendly fabric, a built-in hydration bladder and a design suited for paddlers.
